banshimitangbanshishang_1_4.Text: 让我给他找一套房子住
banshimitangbanshishang_1_4.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_1_11.Text: 哎，这套房子的房租和押金
banshimitangbanshishang_1_11.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_1_13.Text: 这个月的水电费你也不用交了！
banshimitangbanshishang_1_13.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_1_23.Text: 不方便和我这个老太婆挤在一起
banshimitangbanshishang_1_23.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_1_27.Text: 如果是的话，我们可以谈的
banshimitangbanshishang_1_27.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_1_38.Text: 就赶紧地把东西收拾收拾
banshimitangbanshishang_1_38.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_1_40.Text: 哎，我们俩也算是好聚好散
banshimitangbanshishang_1_40.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_1_46.Text: 东西多也可以慢慢收拾好的呀！
banshimitangbanshishang_1_46.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_2_3.Text: 家具风格最好简单一点
banshimitangbanshishang_2_3.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_2_7.Text: 又能看到上海的夜景就更好了
banshimitangbanshishang_2_7.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_2_19.Text: 唉，那别想了，肯定租不起
banshimitangbanshishang_2_19.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_2_22.Text: 很多投行精英都住那儿
banshimitangbanshishang_2_22.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_3_2.Text: 那么从今往后在工作上
banshimitangbanshishang_3_2.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_3_6.Text: 有一位非常厉害的老师
banshimitangbanshishang_3_6.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_3_8.Text: 任你出什么招我都不怕
banshimitangbanshishang_3_8.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_3_11.Text: 年轻有为，足智多谋的老师
banshimitangbanshishang_3_11.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_3_13.Text: 出身投行，且又是高手的
banshimitangbanshishang_3_13.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_3_14.Text: 是不会帮助你这样的人的
banshimitangbanshishang_3_14.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_3_15.Text: 那些闲得去帮助别人的人
banshimitangbanshishang_3_15.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_3_17.Text: 哎，不是每个人都像你这么急功近利
banshimitangbanshishang_3_17.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_3_18.Text: 人家心存高远，易守平常
banshimitangbanshishang_3_18.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_4_1.Text: 没想到袁总的业余生活
banshimitangbanshishang_4_1.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_4_4.Text: 这本书，之所以闻名于世
banshimitangbanshishang_4_4.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_4_7.Text: 你是感受不到它的魅力，
banshimitangbanshishang_4_7.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_4_8.Text: 毕竟心中有佛，才能所见皆佛嘛，
banshimitangbanshishang_4_8.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_4_9.Text: 袁总就是这么骂人不带脏字
banshimitangbanshishang_4_9.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_4_10.Text: 是！高深的人才能体会它的美丽
banshimitangbanshishang_4_10.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_4_17.Text: 小心你的固步自封退早会害了你
banshimitangbanshishang_4_17.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_4_21.Text: 你为什么不能就从今天开始呢？
banshimitangbanshishang_4_21.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_4_22.Text: 这就是你永远成为不了
banshimitangbanshishang_4_22.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_5_3.Text: 调香可以让人舒缓情绪
banshimitangbanshishang_5_3.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_5_6.Text: 所以带你来放松一下喽
banshimitangbanshishang_5_6.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_5_19.Text: 不应该只是用来传递欲望和情感
banshimitangbanshishang_5_19.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_5_21.Text: 有我最喜欢的百合，佛手柑
banshimitangbanshishang_5_21.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_5_23.Text: 闻起来就会给人一种清澈，
banshimitangbanshishang_5_23.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_5_25.Text: 这是我根据你的第一印象调的
banshimitangbanshishang_5_25.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_5_29.Text: 哈哈！第一次有人给我送香水
banshimitangbanshishang_5_29.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_5_30.Text: 就当是老师送你的见面礼喽，
banshimitangbanshishang_5_30.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_6_13.Text: 你就好好在家里边休息
banshimitangbanshishang_6_13.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_6_14.Text: 公司那边我去帮你请假
banshimitangbanshishang_6_14.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_6_20.Text: 你一个连自己都照顾不好的人
banshimitangbanshishang_6_20.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_6_21.Text: 还想管这么危险的事情？
banshimitangbanshishang_6_21.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_6_22.Text: 谁说我自己照顾不好自己啦？
banshimitangbanshishang_6_22.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_6_23.Text: 那个小混混他也受伤了！
banshimitangbanshishang_6_23.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_6_27.Text: 哪个混混还在街上去抢钱？
banshimitangbanshishang_6_27.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_6_29.Text: 就是万山派过来针对你的！
banshimitangbanshishang_6_29.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_6_30.Text: 你现在和唐心的一举一动
banshimitangbanshishang_6_30.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_6_31.Text: 应该都在万山的监视当中
banshimitangbanshishang_6_31.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_6_35.Text: 那也不能放任这件事情，
banshimitangbanshishang_6_35.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_6_39.Text: 我自己会把证据找回来！
banshimitangbanshishang_6_39.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_7_4.Text: 我感觉好像失恋了一样
banshimitangbanshishang_7_4.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_7_5.Text: 我的白马王子好像有女朋友了
banshimitangbanshishang_7_5.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_7_6.Text: 我的故事都还没开始就结束了
banshimitangbanshishang_7_6.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_7_15.Text: 让他去参加情侣外滩活动
banshimitangbanshishang_7_15.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_7_16.Text: 我觉得你也别想太多了
banshimitangbanshishang_7_16.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_7_17.Text: 万一这个人的网名就叫小甜心呢？
banshimitangbanshishang_7_17.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_7_18.Text: 她有可能正在追你男神
banshimitangbanshishang_7_18.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_7_21.Text: 他给我备注是便利店小妹诶，
banshimitangbanshishang_7_21.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_7_23.Text: 如果你真的对一个人有好感，
banshimitangbanshishang_7_23.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_8_9.Text: 你是不是对你手下的员工有点，
banshimitangbanshishang_8_9.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_8_11.Text: 我是担心她泄露公司机密
banshimitangbanshishang_8_11.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_8_14.Text: 这还真的是我们交手以来
banshimitangbanshishang_8_14.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_8_17.Text: 不对这个女孩感兴趣呢？
banshimitangbanshishang_8_17.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_9_3.Text: 天下从来都没有白吃的午餐，
banshimitangbanshishang_9_3.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_9_6.Text: 那这天下有白送的房子吗？
banshimitangbanshishang_9_6.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_9_13.Text: 当初没让你进MH太过分了
banshimitangbanshishang_9_13.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_9_15.Text: 你看咱们俩这么多年的交情是吧，
banshimitangbanshishang_9_15.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_9_16.Text: 我希望你有一个良好的居住环境
banshimitangbanshishang_9_16.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_9_17.Text: 来弥补你的这个失业之苦嘛，
banshimitangbanshishang_9_17.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_9_26.Text: 对别人的生活指手画脚
banshimitangbanshishang_9_26.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_9_28.Text: 你看着我一个人搬进搬出
banshimitangbanshishang_9_28.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_9_31.Text: 我那套房子难道不比你之前住的
banshimitangbanshishang_9_31.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_10_5.Text: 让你平时不注意休息和饮食
banshimitangbanshishang_10_5.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_10_13.Text: 拖下去发炎穿孔是要命的！
banshimitangbanshishang_10_13.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_10_16.Text: 我有很重要的工作没做完
banshimitangbanshishang_10_16.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_10_18.Text: 什么工作能比你身体更重要？
banshimitangbanshishang_10_18.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_11_4.Text: 不然你以为我们在这儿干嘛？
banshimitangbanshishang_11_4.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_11_7.Text: 做手术一般都有很大的风险的
banshimitangbanshishang_11_7.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_11_9.Text: 我觉得医生应该闭着眼睛
banshimitangbanshishang_11_9.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_11_11.Text: 喂！这好歹也是个手术啊！
banshimitangbanshishang_11_11.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_11_12.Text: 你能不能不要说得跟玩一样？
banshimitangbanshishang_11_12.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_11_13.Text: 我难道还不算是在安慰你吗？
banshimitangbanshishang_11_13.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_11_17.Text: 我会在外面给你送祝福的！
banshimitangbanshishang_11_17.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_12_2.Text: 我今天早上发现了一个
banshimitangbanshishang_12_2.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_12_5.Text: 就是住在你隔壁的那个江总
banshimitangbanshishang_12_5.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_12_9.Text: 我今天早上亲眼看到的
banshimitangbanshishang_12_9.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_12_12.Text: 我看见他们两个人住在一起了
banshimitangbanshishang_12_12.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_12_16.Text: 我跟你说，你可离她远点啊！
banshimitangbanshishang_12_16.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_12_20.Text: 她是我们顶头大老板的女儿
banshimitangbanshishang_12_20.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_12_25.Text: 那个小袁助理是她养的小白脸？
banshimitangbanshishang_12_25.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_12_27.Text: 你要这么理解也不是不可以
banshimitangbanshishang_12_27.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_12_28.Text: 反正你就尽量少去找他们俩
banshimitangbanshishang_12_28.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_12_30.Text: 她在公司该给我穿小鞋了
banshimitangbanshishang_12_30.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_13_1.Text: 乔总有什么事情不能在公司说
banshimitangbanshishang_13_1.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_13_3.Text: 有很多事情都不能在办公室说
banshimitangbanshishang_13_3.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_13_6.Text: 其实今天在公司我遇到一个女孩
banshimitangbanshishang_13_6.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_13_12.Text: 你怎么可能会有女朋友呢！
banshimitangbanshishang_13_12.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_13_13.Text: 我为什么就不能有女朋友呢？
banshimitangbanshishang_13_13.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_13_21.Text: 相信瞬间可以变成永恒
banshimitangbanshishang_13_21.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_13_27.Text: 所有人都觉得我们两个
banshimitangbanshishang_13_27.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_13_33.Text: 把你当成我最好的朋友
banshimitangbanshishang_13_33.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_14_4.Text: 我正好去看看我大侄女去
banshimitangbanshishang_14_4.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_14_5.Text: 哎呀，它爸也不知道消失去哪儿了
banshimitangbanshishang_14_5.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_14_6.Text: 它妈因为他的事心力憔悴
banshimitangbanshishang_14_6.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_14_7.Text: 估计这个点她还在加班呢！
banshimitangbanshishang_14_7.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_15_11.Text: 我应该更早一点地考虑到这些
banshimitangbanshishang_15_11.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_15_28.Text: 你说，我们的孩子要叫什么？
banshimitangbanshishang_15_28.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_16_2.Text: 昨天是我喝多了，对不起
banshimitangbanshishang_16_2.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_16_4.Text: 我觉得可能我说没关系
banshimitangbanshishang_16_4.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_16_7.Text: 我会尽力调整我的状态
banshimitangbanshishang_16_7.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_17_1.Text: 有什么需要我帮你的吗？
banshimitangbanshishang_17_1.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_17_8.Text: 这件事如果处理不好的话，
banshimitangbanshishang_17_8.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_17_15.Text: 但是我们绝对没有做过
banshimitangbanshishang_17_15.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_17_16.Text: 帖子上说的其他乱七八糟的事情
banshimitangbanshishang_17_16.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_17_17.Text: 你觉得你现在摆出一副
banshimitangbanshishang_17_17.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_17_20.Text: 我会自己去董事会陈情
banshimitangbanshishang_17_20.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_19_2.Text: 有没有感觉到生命的力量？
banshimitangbanshishang_19_2.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_19_3.Text: 大姐，你这孕肚都还没显呢，
banshimitangbanshishang_19_3.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_19_5.Text: 你认真一点感受一下嘛，
banshimitangbanshishang_19_5.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_19_13.Text: 咱俩的孩子就可以结娃娃亲了！
banshimitangbanshishang_19_13.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_19_14.Text: 别瞎说，我们还没结婚呢，
banshimitangbanshishang_19_14.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_20_5.Text: 我都还没说呢，你就不想听了？
banshimitangbanshishang_20_5.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_20_6.Text: 因为你每次这表情的时候
banshimitangbanshishang_20_6.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_20_11.Text: 我贾元吉这辈子就认定你了，
banshimitangbanshishang_20_11.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_20_15.Text: 我想让你，帮我找一个司机
banshimitangbanshishang_20_15.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_20_21.Text: 我，肯定给你找一个贼好的司机！
banshimitangbanshishang_20_21.Speaker: B

banshimitangbanshishang_20_25.Text: 我说你平时不是挺会顺杆爬的吗？
banshimitangbanshishang_20_25.Speaker: A

banshimitangbanshishang_20_28.Text: 让我做你司机，送你上下班！
banshimitangbanshishang_20_28.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_1_5.Text: 好了好了，花钱买个清净
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_1_5.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_1_13.Text: 我不是想看那个球赛嘛
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_1_13.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_1_15.Text: 这一辈子都见不着一次呢
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_1_15.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_1_18.Text: 你一天到晚连动都不想动一下
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_1_18.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_2_9.Text: 我本来想打工给你买曼联的票的
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_2_9.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_2_10.Text: 但是在打工的地方遇到了吴柏松
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_2_10.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_2_18.Text: 所以你就可以随便对我乱发脾气？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_2_18.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_3_11.Text: 你说就你这样的还不着急？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_3_11.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_3_12.Text: 你现在都是重点观察对象了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_3_12.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_3_14.Text: 一天天嘻里马哈你说你
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_3_14.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_1.Text: 我觉得李束有女朋友了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_1.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_5.Text: 又没有婴儿肥的假惺惺的女人
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_5.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_6.Text: 我觉得他肯定不会喜欢我
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_6.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_8.Text: 你不也是大长腿小细腰
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_8.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_9.Text: 没有婴儿肥的假惺惺的女人吗？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_9.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_12.Text: 因为我今天也跟你遇到了一样的事情
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_12.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_14.Text: 今天早上江辰系的那个围巾
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_14.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_17.Text: 我亲眼看见李薇送给他的
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_17.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_18.Text: 江辰那一抽展礼物也不差李薇这一个
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_18.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_20.Text: 都是别人偷偷塞给他的
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_20.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_22.Text: 可是他却收了李薇的礼物
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_4_22.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_5_4.Text: 应该只会影响我跳水上芭蕾
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_5_4.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_5_5.Text: 早知道就不让你游给我看了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_5_5.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_5_8.Text: 我就是训练最近有点累
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_5_8.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_5_12.Text: 那等待会儿医生的结果出来了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_5_12.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_6_1.Text: 您今天找我过来是有什么事吗？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_6_1.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_6_5.Text: 叔叔叫你过来是想请你帮个忙
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_6_5.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_6_10.Text: 他的伤比我们预想的都要严重
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_6_10.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_6_23.Text: 我们这帮朋友都会陪着他的
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_6_23.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_2.Text: 我要开始重新读高一的课本了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_2.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_3.Text: 这回真的成为一个好学生
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_3.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_4.Text: 其实我觉得你当什么都无所谓
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_4.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_5.Text: 反正你是一个很厉害的人
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_5.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_7.Text: 做什么都会做的很好的
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_7.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_11.Text: 妈妈真的觉得你很不错
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_11.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_14.Text: 我总觉得自己好像赚到了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_14.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_23.Text: 我们都已经这么骄傲了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_23.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_28.Text: 我们都会站在你身边无条件支持你
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_28.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_32.Text: 靠你这张脸买东西能打折
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_32.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_33.Text: 所以说是有条件支持你的
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_7_33.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_8_5.Text: 陆杨那天那场盛大的表白
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_8_5.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_8_6.Text: 你难道就一点都不感动？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_8_6.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_8_8.Text: 我肯定开心地能翻十二个跟头
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_8_8.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_8_14.Text: 爱情的小种子萌芽了吧？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_8_14.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_9.Text: 学校发的卷子我也给你带来了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_9.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_10.Text: 我给你写了解题过程和标注
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_10.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_13.Text: 我补习老师每天给我十张卷子
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_13.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_19.Text: 真的不用了你拿回去吧
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_19.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_21.Text: 你别在我这儿浪费时间了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_21.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_24.Text: 陆杨你非得这么对我吗？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_24.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_27.Text: 我再问你一遍卷子你要不要？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_9_27.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_10_1.Text: 真打算去清华学数学了呀？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_10_1.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_10_2.Text: 小希那天在我这哀豪了半天
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_10_2.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_10_12.Text: 毕业以后就在一起了吧？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_10_12.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_10_13.Text: 羡慕的话就别躲着林静晓
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_10_13.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_10_15.Text: 你说我是不是挺混蛋的？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_10_15.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_10_21.Text: 想那么多一点都不像你了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_10_21.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_11_4.Text: 带你去买两件羽绒服啊
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_11_4.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_11_9.Text: 去清华是稳打稳的事了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_11_9.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_11_13.Text: 你知道我为什么学数学吗？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_11_13.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_11_15.Text: 因为你觉得我爸学数学
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_11_15.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_12_3.Text: 治好了就能谈女朋友了？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_12_3.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_12_5.Text: 那如果发现治了治不好呢？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_12_5.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_13_2.Text: 有男朋友怎么可能一人来看房子呢？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_13_2.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_13_9.Text: 我说你这人怎么回事啊？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_13_9.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_15_1.Text: 现在的婚纱怎么都这么贵啊？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_15_1.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_15_4.Text: 别怕这是我新买的宠物
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_15_4.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_15_10.Text: 我还给它取名叫小蜥，蜥蜴的蜥
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_15_10.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_15_14.Text: 你怎么养这么小只的蜥蜴啊？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_15_14.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_16_1.Text: 因为我真的不想再去猜你心里到底在想什么了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_16_1.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_16_2.Text: 三年前是你提的分手对吧？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_16_2.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_16_3.Text: 分手的原因是你觉得我想离开你
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_16_3.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_16_11.Text: 不过现在这些都不重要了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_16_11.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_16_17.Text: 差点被房屋中介欺负了
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_16_17.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_17_4.Text: 你是因为我没有跟你求婚
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_17_4.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_17_10.Text: 让我找到很多人都找不到的爱情
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_17_10.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_17_11.Text: 你怎么突然会说这么煽情的话？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_17_11.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_17_12.Text: 他们说求婚都得说这么煽情的话
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_17_12.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_17_15.Text: 那，那要不你先去做手术吧
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_17_15.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_17_19.Text: 那，那你快把戒指拿出来吧
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_17_19.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_3.Text: 什么都没写你挂上去干什么呀？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_3.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_6.Text: 你不是还要去做手术吗？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_6.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_11.Text: 上哪找了这么丑的气球？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_11.Speaker: A

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_17.Text: 陈小希你高中的化学课都在睡觉吗？
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_17.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_18.Text: 氦气是一种比空气轻的惰性气体
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_18.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_19.Text: 一般大型医院的核磁共振设备都需要用到
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_19.Speaker: B

zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_20.Text: 听起来好像很厉害的样子
zhiwomendanchundexiaomeihao_18_20.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_1_5.Text: 没事没事，你也去春风啊？
xiaohuanxi_1_5.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_1_21.Text: 对是不是每次开家长会
xiaohuanxi_1_21.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_2_4.Text: 你怎么还在那儿学习呢？
xiaohuanxi_2_4.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_2_6.Text: 你二十四小时都在学习
xiaohuanxi_2_6.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_2_9.Text: 要不是老师们出去判卷
xiaohuanxi_2_9.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_2_11.Text: 你得学会利用这个时间
xiaohuanxi_2_11.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_2_13.Text: 那放假不学习还能干吗呀？
xiaohuanxi_2_13.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_2_18.Text: 我不打，反正我也没兴趣
xiaohuanxi_2_18.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_2_20.Text: 总比你在那儿一直闷着头学习强
xiaohuanxi_2_20.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_2_22.Text: 我得好好复习复习化学
xiaohuanxi_2_22.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_2_30.Text: 你降了就等于给别人点机会
xiaohuanxi_2_30.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_2_32.Text: 再说了你都学习这么久了
xiaohuanxi_2_32.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_2_33.Text: 你要学会去分配你自己的时间
xiaohuanxi_2_33.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_2_34.Text: 哪有刚考完试就学习的呀？
xiaohuanxi_2_34.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_2_37.Text: 有的时候我真的就是不明白
xiaohuanxi_2_37.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_3_7.Text: 要不你给你妈打个电话
xiaohuanxi_3_7.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_4_5.Text: 方一凡在摩掌英子后背
xiaohuanxi_4_5.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_4_8.Text: 我这不也跟你一块看见的吗！
xiaohuanxi_4_8.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_4_16.Text: 现在是大孩子了不是小孩子了
xiaohuanxi_4_16.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_4_17.Text: 这时候咱们撞见了多尴尬呀！
xiaohuanxi_4_17.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_4_20.Text: 这么光天化日地抱在一起
xiaohuanxi_4_20.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_5_4.Text: 没怎么，你怎么也不出点声啊？
xiaohuanxi_5_4.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_5_5.Text: 我这不是刚从厕所出来吗
xiaohuanxi_5_5.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_6_2.Text: 你儿子今天回来的时候
xiaohuanxi_6_2.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_6_9.Text: 那我没注意他心情什么样
xiaohuanxi_6_9.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_6_12.Text: 然后到冰箱拿了什么饮料
xiaohuanxi_6_12.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_6_24.Text: 好像还唱了什么，你是我的小苹果
xiaohuanxi_6_24.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_7_10.Text: 我十八岁什么也没谈过
xiaohuanxi_7_10.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_11.Text: 我跟你说我谈恋爱都是吹牛呢
xiaohuanxi_7_11.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_12.Text: 我那会儿正想着考政法大学
xiaohuanxi_7_12.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_15.Text: 方一凡谈恋爱我不太相信
xiaohuanxi_7_15.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_16.Text: 他这人心智发育都不成熟
xiaohuanxi_7_16.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_23.Text: 我，我跟宋倩我们俩回来
xiaohuanxi_7_23.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_7_24.Text: 看见这俩孩子抱在楼道口那儿
xiaohuanxi_7_24.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_7_29.Text: 废话，我儿子我能看不清吗？
xiaohuanxi_7_29.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_7_34.Text: 他他俩抱着脑补一下那画面
xiaohuanxi_7_34.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_40.Text: 他现在谈恋爱那就是自毁前程
xiaohuanxi_7_40.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_7_44.Text: 这到了高三要是一谈恋爱
xiaohuanxi_7_44.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_50.Text: 这，这也不是很准吧这个？
xiaohuanxi_7_50.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_51.Text: 我也是这么跟宋倩解释的
xiaohuanxi_7_51.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_7_57.Text: 要是我的女儿被这么一抱
xiaohuanxi_7_57.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_7_58.Text: 我也得气炸了，人家是女儿
xiaohuanxi_7_58.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_7_65.Text: 那你说你要是乔卫东你怎么想？
xiaohuanxi_7_65.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_7_69.Text: 我女儿被方圆的儿子给
xiaohuanxi_7_69.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_70.Text: 那我非得把方圆杀了不可！
xiaohuanxi_7_70.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_74.Text: 你说咱们也不好直接去问凡凡吧
xiaohuanxi_7_74.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_7_78.Text: 再说要不是你问了他也尴尬呀
xiaohuanxi_7_78.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_82.Text: 他到底是不是真谈恋爱了
xiaohuanxi_7_82.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_83.Text: 我问你呀他俩怎么抱的
xiaohuanxi_7_83.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_84.Text: 你要是平常人这么抱一抱
xiaohuanxi_7_84.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_85.Text: 你怎么就认为是谈恋爱
xiaohuanxi_7_85.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_7_91.Text: 楼着她这个头靠得特别近
xiaohuanxi_7_91.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_7_97.Text: 这个方一凡还摩挲摩挲她
xiaohuanxi_7_97.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_8_1.Text: 我记得这座椅原来是记忆座椅啊
xiaohuanxi_8_1.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_8_2.Text: 怎么没记住我的位置啊？
xiaohuanxi_8_2.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_8_3.Text: 我觉得空间好像变窄了似的
xiaohuanxi_8_3.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_8_12.Text: 那肚子可不就越来越大吗？
xiaohuanxi_8_12.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_8_13.Text: 行了行了，你要不你前边靠边
xiaohuanxi_8_13.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_8_15.Text: 没，没十来分钟的路别折腾了
xiaohuanxi_8_15.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_8_20.Text: 是不是最近老忙活家里的事
xiaohuanxi_8_20.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_8_22.Text: 不耽误这有什么耽误的
xiaohuanxi_8_22.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_8_27.Text: 明儿多拉两趟就补回来了
xiaohuanxi_8_27.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_9_5.Text: 你什么时候想聊天文了
xiaohuanxi_9_5.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_9_6.Text: 你就跟他们一起去聊一聊
xiaohuanxi_9_6.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_9_8.Text: 肯定特别有意思，好不好？
xiaohuanxi_9_8.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_9_11.Text: 已经没那么想学天文了
xiaohuanxi_9_11.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_9_13.Text: 怎么能说不学就不学了呢？
xiaohuanxi_9_13.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_9_17.Text: 我记得您之前也跟我说过
xiaohuanxi_9_17.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_9_21.Text: 只不过可能结果没那么好
xiaohuanxi_9_21.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_9_22.Text: 曲线救国的道路有很多
xiaohuanxi_9_22.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_9_23.Text: 不一定非得一根筋走到底
xiaohuanxi_9_23.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_10_3.Text: 您最近身体怎么样了呢？
xiaohuanxi_10_3.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_10_4.Text: 阿姨上次微信跟你说的
xiaohuanxi_10_4.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_10_5.Text: 活检结果不是挺好的吗
xiaohuanxi_10_5.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_10_12.Text: 您的身体没事我就放心了
xiaohuanxi_10_12.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_10_14.Text: 你应该好好地调整自己的状态
xiaohuanxi_10_14.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_10_16.Text: 要是有什么话呢想跟阿姨讲
xiaohuanxi_10_16.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_10_18.Text: 你什么时候跟阿姨说都可以的
xiaohuanxi_10_18.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_11_3.Text: 我从来没有通过自己的努力
xiaohuanxi_11_3.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_11_8.Text: 咱们现在一周是上两次课对吧？
xiaohuanxi_11_8.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_11_13.Text: 你看但是如果按王阿姨那么算
xiaohuanxi_11_13.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_11_14.Text: 她要两天上一次课的话
xiaohuanxi_11_14.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_11_22.Text: 那加上之前的三千就一万！
xiaohuanxi_11_22.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_12_3.Text: 怎么这么多啊？这太吓人了吧
xiaohuanxi_12_3.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_12_8.Text: 我最近吧老是睡不好觉
xiaohuanxi_12_8.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_12_10.Text: 更年期综合征掉这么多头发
xiaohuanxi_12_10.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_12_15.Text: 是因为前两年在青海的时候吧
xiaohuanxi_12_15.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_12_16.Text: 有点不太适应高原反应
xiaohuanxi_12_16.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_13_2.Text: 艺术院校那通过的那个
xiaohuanxi_13_2.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_13_4.Text: 那个要能上我愁什么愁啊？
xiaohuanxi_13_4.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_13_7.Text: 那个是要看专业课排名的
xiaohuanxi_13_7.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_13_10.Text: 他现在专业课排名靠后啊
xiaohuanxi_13_10.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_13_12.Text: 起码得二本是吧，，才保险呀
xiaohuanxi_13_12.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_13_15.Text: 那有什么别的法子没有这是
xiaohuanxi_13_15.Speaker: A

xiaohuanxi_13_19.Text: 她说我们这儿的学生啊
xiaohuanxi_13_19.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_13_24.Text: 对然后只要二本上线就行了
xiaohuanxi_13_24.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_13_34.Text: 我看看它什么流程政策
xiaohuanxi_13_34.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_14_18.Text: 你自己做是不也犯法的？
xiaohuanxi_14_18.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_14_28.Text: 但咱不是骗三岁的孩子
xiaohuanxi_14_28.Speaker: B

xiaohuanxi_14_33.Text: 她也没见过结婚证啊她
xiaohuanxi_14_33.Speaker: A

yijiarenzhiming_1_1.Text: 对了，你晚上想吃什么呀？
yijiarenzhiming_1_1.Speaker: A

yijiarenzhiming_2_12.Text: 你有个交往了五年的男朋友
yijiarenzhiming_2_12.Speaker: A

yijiarenzhiming_3_8.Text: 你这个样子可以不像哥哥
yijiarenzhiming_3_8.Speaker: B

yijiarenzhiming_3_12.Text: 那李尖尖以后结婚的话
yijiarenzhiming_3_12.Speaker: B

yijiarenzhiming_3_17.Text: 你们男人没一个好东西！
yijiarenzhiming_3_17.Speaker: A

yijiarenzhiming_5_1.Text: 你要真能考上清华北大
yijiarenzhiming_5_1.Speaker: A

yijiarenzhiming_5_6.Text: 但是我没有办法跟你说
yijiarenzhiming_5_6.Speaker: B

yijiarenzhiming_5_15.Text: 你们为什么那么讨厌我？
yijiarenzhiming_5_15.Speaker: A

yijiarenzhiming_6_1.Text: 妈你怎么进来不敲门啊
yijiarenzhiming_6_1.Speaker: A

yijiarenzhiming_7_8.Text: 你整个人就滔滔不绝的
yijiarenzhiming_7_8.Speaker: B

yijiarenzhiming_7_22.Text: 你提起博物馆的工作啊
yijiarenzhiming_7_22.Speaker: B

yijiarenzhiming_10_1.Text: 你能不能给我解释一下
yijiarenzhiming_10_1.Speaker: A

yijiarenzhiming_10_13.Text: 这就是我养大的眼珠子
yijiarenzhiming_10_13.Speaker: A

yijiarenzhiming_14_11.Text: 我问这些都是为了你好
yijiarenzhiming_14_11.Speaker: A

yijiarenzhiming_16_4.Text: 所以，我不让你进我房间
yijiarenzhiming_16_4.Speaker: B

yijiarenzhiming_17_12.Text: 你的钱不都是他给的吗？
yijiarenzhiming_17_12.Speaker: A

yijiarenzhiming_17_16.Text: 那那你开店的钱谁给的？
yijiarenzhiming_17_16.Speaker: A

yijiarenzhiming_17_17.Text: 不是谁给的，是我自己的
yijiarenzhiming_17_17.Speaker: B

yijiarenzhiming_17_18.Text: 你自己的是什么意思啊？
yijiarenzhiming_17_18.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_1_2.Text: 能不能别再你们班我们班的了
nihaojiushiguang_1_2.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_1_4.Text: 不是你们三班最近是不是群雄割据呀？
nihaojiushiguang_1_4.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_1_5.Text: 哎？凌翔茜那班长是不是特别不好干？
nihaojiushiguang_1_5.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_1_11.Text: 哎哟我以为多大点事呢！
nihaojiushiguang_1_11.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_1_14.Text: 去收集一下各班的板报设计图
nihaojiushiguang_1_14.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_1_16.Text: 你帮你们家周周别扯上我呀！
nihaojiushiguang_1_16.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_1_25.Text: 要是这个板报画好了得奖了
nihaojiushiguang_1_25.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_2_4.Text: 错，负隅顽抗，说死也不能承认
nihaojiushiguang_2_4.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_2_5.Text: 只要你不承认小潘就干没辙
nihaojiushiguang_2_5.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_2_10.Text: 我就是怕万一我承认了
nihaojiushiguang_2_10.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_2_11.Text: 以后就不能跟余周周一个班了
nihaojiushiguang_2_11.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_2_15.Text: 你是没看到板报被毁的时候
nihaojiushiguang_2_15.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_2_16.Text: 她那一脸伤心难过样儿
nihaojiushiguang_2_16.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_2_18.Text: 你为余周周做了那么多
nihaojiushiguang_2_18.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_2_21.Text: 反正我就是不想看到她伤心
nihaojiushiguang_2_21.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_3_2.Text: 最近也不知道怎么回事
nihaojiushiguang_3_2.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_3_6.Text: 你说这现在车怎么那么多
nihaojiushiguang_3_6.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_3_7.Text: 除此之外最近请过假没有啊？
nihaojiushiguang_3_7.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_3_10.Text: 我们三班的成绩可有明显回升
nihaojiushiguang_3_10.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_3_21.Text: 怎么说精力跟不上了啊？
nihaojiushiguang_3_21.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_3_23.Text: 你说咱们是不是上岁数了啊？
nihaojiushiguang_3_23.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_3_25.Text: 我最近我也不知道怎么回事
nihaojiushiguang_3_25.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_3_28.Text: 我跟你说呀，你就是太辛苦
nihaojiushiguang_3_28.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_3_32.Text: 我最近发现一个历史讲座型节目
nihaojiushiguang_3_32.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_3_36.Text: 潘主任你看那我还有课
nihaojiushiguang_3_36.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_4_1.Text: 这是你们班英语考试成绩
nihaojiushiguang_4_1.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_4_3.Text: 你是想跟我谈谈这两个
nihaojiushiguang_4_3.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_4_6.Text: 当时学校留的时候就很犹豫
nihaojiushiguang_4_6.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_4_9.Text: 但是你看看他们的成绩啊！
nihaojiushiguang_4_9.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_4_10.Text: 后两名的成绩加一块儿
nihaojiushiguang_4_10.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_4_11.Text: 还没有倒数第三名的分数高
nihaojiushiguang_4_11.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_4_12.Text: 他们刚来可能还没有适应
nihaojiushiguang_4_12.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_4_15.Text: 他们怕跟不上振华的进度
nihaojiushiguang_4_15.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_4_18.Text: 小潘，你就把他们留下吧啊！
nihaojiushiguang_4_18.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_4_20.Text: 那这次为什么就不一样呢？
nihaojiushiguang_4_20.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_5_1.Text: 我觉得你已经不适合做班主任了
nihaojiushiguang_5_1.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_5_2.Text: 我已经和教语文的张老师说了
nihaojiushiguang_5_2.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_5_7.Text: 我自从第一天到振华起
nihaojiushiguang_5_7.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_5_8.Text: 就是班主任已经是二十三年了
nihaojiushiguang_5_8.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_5_10.Text: 学校家长市教委都非常非常的重视
nihaojiushiguang_5_10.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_5_11.Text: 我不允许学生有任何的退步
nihaojiushiguang_5_11.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_5_12.Text: 可三班的成绩并没有受影响
nihaojiushiguang_5_12.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_5_20.Text: 那我不决定我怎么办啊！
nihaojiushiguang_5_20.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_5_21.Text: 我能逼着你把电视台的事情辞掉吗？
nihaojiushiguang_5_21.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_5_22.Text: 你以后可是大明星啊！大学问家！
nihaojiushiguang_5_22.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_6_9.Text: 这个林杨啊，原来是周周的小学同学
nihaojiushiguang_6_9.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_6_12.Text: 可是后来因为一些别的事
nihaojiushiguang_6_12.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_6_15.Text: 你想周周都这么多年了
nihaojiushiguang_6_15.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_6_16.Text: 变化这么大他还能一下就认出来
nihaojiushiguang_6_16.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_6_17.Text: 你这观察的也够仔细的
nihaojiushiguang_6_17.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_6_19.Text: 看来年轻的时候也没少记
nihaojiushiguang_6_19.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_7_2.Text: 当这个节目组的总策划之一
nihaojiushiguang_7_2.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_7_3.Text: 之一？那之二之三是谁呀？
nihaojiushiguang_7_3.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_7_5.Text: 我们的任务就是监督一下
nihaojiushiguang_7_5.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_7_6.Text: 这个节目的内容和形式
nihaojiushiguang_7_6.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_7_13.Text: 就缺少点歌曲类的节目
nihaojiushiguang_7_13.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_7_19.Text: 这个艺术节就应该节目形式
nihaojiushiguang_7_19.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_7_21.Text: 一定要百花齐放博采众长
nihaojiushiguang_7_21.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_8_2.Text: 我说那个歌曲类节目没人报吧！
nihaojiushiguang_8_2.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_8_7.Text: 他们班本来排的是舞台剧
nihaojiushiguang_8_7.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_8_9.Text: 他那个节目简直就是胡闹！
nihaojiushiguang_8_9.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_8_15.Text: 你是我的眼带我什么什么
nihaojiushiguang_8_15.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_8_17.Text: 不行！换换换！让他们赶快换！
nihaojiushiguang_8_17.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_8_19.Text: 人家班本来排的舞台剧您给毙了
nihaojiushiguang_8_19.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_8_20.Text: 这次换歌曲联唱您又不让
nihaojiushiguang_8_20.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_8_23.Text: 他们班排练舞台剧挺上心的
nihaojiushiguang_8_23.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_8_26.Text: 我让他们再重新调整一下
nihaojiushiguang_8_26.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_8_27.Text: 换一个有文化底蕴积极向上的剧
nihaojiushiguang_8_27.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_8_31.Text: 尽快给您一个最佳方案
nihaojiushiguang_8_31.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_9_2.Text: 小潘，你是不是有点自恋呢？
nihaojiushiguang_9_2.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_9_4.Text: 那咱们振华比那个师大附中的
nihaojiushiguang_9_4.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_9_12.Text: 那其实我觉得都差不多
nihaojiushiguang_9_12.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_9_25.Text: 拿着网球拍或者是羽毛球拍
nihaojiushiguang_9_25.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_9_26.Text: 然后站在这个大草坪上
nihaojiushiguang_9_26.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_10_1.Text: 你忙得连你爸都没时间见了吗？
nihaojiushiguang_10_1.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_10_3.Text: 我们家和周沈然他们家一块吃饭
nihaojiushiguang_10_3.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_10_6.Text: 你能不能别管我这事啊？
nihaojiushiguang_10_6.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_10_12.Text: 尽过一个做父亲的责任
nihaojiushiguang_10_12.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_10_13.Text: 周周，你听说过水浒卡吗？
nihaojiushiguang_10_13.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_10_14.Text: 就是吃干脆面集的一种卡片
nihaojiushiguang_10_14.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_10_15.Text: 那会儿我最想集的就是林冲
nihaojiushiguang_10_15.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_10_17.Text: 后来我们班一个不集卡片的人
nihaojiushiguang_10_17.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_10_23.Text: 我吃了不只二十块钱的方便面
nihaojiushiguang_10_23.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_10_26.Text: 所以你是说我见我爸爸
nihaojiushiguang_10_26.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_10_28.Text: 我是说你不要做让自己后悔的事
nihaojiushiguang_10_28.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_11_5.Text: 你好吗？你在干嘛？你吃了吗？
nihaojiushiguang_11_5.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_11_6.Text: 随便说点什么有那么难吗？
nihaojiushiguang_11_6.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_11_7.Text: 可是这样会不会太矫情了呀！
nihaojiushiguang_11_7.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_11_8.Text: 按理说吧，女孩是应该端着点
nihaojiushiguang_11_8.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_11_10.Text: 人家林杨为了你出走的事
nihaojiushiguang_11_10.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_11_11.Text: 前前后后打了多少个电话
nihaojiushiguang_11_11.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_11_14.Text: 这次你可欠人家一大人情
nihaojiushiguang_11_14.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_11_17.Text: 可是我也不知道欠他什么欠他多少
nihaojiushiguang_11_17.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_11_20.Text: 我以后不会再离家出走了
nihaojiushiguang_11_20.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_12_4.Text: 考试时候你什么意思呀啊？
nihaojiushiguang_12_4.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_12_6.Text: 你不会？你看都没看一眼
nihaojiushiguang_12_6.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_12_15.Text: 作弊？说得跟你没作过整似的！
nihaojiushiguang_12_15.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_12_19.Text: 咱们来振华一个学期了
nihaojiushiguang_12_19.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_12_20.Text: 我不能总跟你同流合污吧？
nihaojiushiguang_12_20.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_12_23.Text: 你别以为自己上过几天补习班
nihaojiushiguang_12_23.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_12_24.Text: 又跟二班那帅哥眉来眼去几天
nihaojiushiguang_12_24.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_12_27.Text: 别指望能跟振华学生一样
nihaojiushiguang_12_27.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_12_29.Text: 不过你的提醒只适用于你自己
nihaojiushiguang_12_29.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_13_2.Text: 茜茜，我知道你心情不好
nihaojiushiguang_13_2.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_13_4.Text: 我为什么不好啊？我挺好的！
nihaojiushiguang_13_4.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_13_6.Text: 你不就这一次没考好吗？
nihaojiushiguang_13_6.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_13_7.Text: 别给自己这么大压力啊！
nihaojiushiguang_13_7.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_13_9.Text: 蒋川你别老装出—副很懂我的样子
nihaojiushiguang_13_9.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_13_13.Text: 我每天睁开眼睛要面对的一切
nihaojiushiguang_13_13.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_13_15.Text: 说破天不就是零点五分嘛！
nihaojiushiguang_13_15.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_13_16.Text: 再说了第一和第二有什么区别？
nihaojiushiguang_13_16.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_13_17.Text: 那我问你第一个登上月球的人是谁？
nihaojiushiguang_13_17.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_13_23.Text: 这就是第一和第二的区别！
nihaojiushiguang_13_23.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_13_24.Text: 第二永远是第一的陪衬！
nihaojiushiguang_13_24.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_14_1.Text: 我昨天晚上让你看电视你看了没？
nihaojiushiguang_14_1.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_14_2.Text: 我跟小飞玩了一夜游戏
nihaojiushiguang_14_2.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_14_7.Text: 什么你不觉得我很美吗？
nihaojiushiguang_14_7.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_14_17.Text: 一副没见过世面的样子
nihaojiushiguang_14_17.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_14_18.Text: 这不是上电视的问题好吗？
nihaojiushiguang_14_18.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_14_19.Text: 你不觉得在电视屏幕里
nihaojiushiguang_14_19.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_14_20.Text: 看到你自己和你自己身边的人
nihaojiushiguang_14_20.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_14_23.Text: 那我觉得周周挺漂亮的
nihaojiushiguang_14_23.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_15_2.Text: 要是多年后回过头来看的话
nihaojiushiguang_15_2.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_15_8.Text: 比如说动物世界就是纪录片
nihaojiushiguang_15_8.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_15_10.Text: 其实有很多纪录片是很有意思
nihaojiushiguang_15_10.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_15_12.Text: 我觉得你可以跟被拍摄的对象
nihaojiushiguang_15_12.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_15_18.Text: 我应该是第一个对你有提问的吧！
nihaojiushiguang_15_18.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_15_20.Text: 没想到你还挺有想法的嘛！
nihaojiushiguang_15_20.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_16_4.Text: 你怎么想的也是这么平凡的未来啊！
nihaojiushiguang_16_4.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_16_5.Text: 你可是我们振华一草啊！
nihaojiushiguang_16_5.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_16_7.Text: 你怎么知道我家境好啊！
nihaojiushiguang_16_7.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_16_10.Text: 难道过着平凡的日子不好吗？
nihaojiushiguang_16_10.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_16_12.Text: 但是你不是挺喜欢电影什么的吗？
nihaojiushiguang_16_12.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_16_13.Text: 你看你借我这个采访室
nihaojiushiguang_16_13.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_16_14.Text: 应该也不只是支持校园文化吧？
nihaojiushiguang_16_14.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_17_2.Text: 我看你是不是又拿着你那个DV
nihaojiushiguang_17_2.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_17_3.Text: 感觉你最近跟电视台搞暗访似的
nihaojiushiguang_17_3.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_17_4.Text: 动不动就拿着小机器偷拍
nihaojiushiguang_17_4.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_17_5.Text: 什么叫偷拍啊，我这是明察暗访
nihaojiushiguang_17_5.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_17_7.Text: 我还有楚主席给的采访室呢！
nihaojiushiguang_17_7.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_17_9.Text: 就从奸商变成楚主席了
nihaojiushiguang_17_9.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_17_12.Text: 跟我们不是一个世界的
nihaojiushiguang_17_12.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_17_20.Text: 你是说十年后的自己啊？
nihaojiushiguang_17_20.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_17_23.Text: 没人不知道了吧，见面就问
nihaojiushiguang_17_23.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_18_1.Text: 我有一个好消息和一个坏消息
nihaojiushiguang_18_1.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_18_4.Text: 坏消息啊，坏消息就是没去面试
nihaojiushiguang_18_4.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_18_8.Text: 不过好消息就是我把塔守住了
nihaojiushiguang_18_8.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_18_9.Text: 不去也行等下次机会吧！
nihaojiushiguang_18_9.Speaker: B

nihaojiushiguang_18_10.Text: 不对媳妇儿你绝对有事
nihaojiushiguang_18_10.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_18_12.Text: 说我在家待着跟林杨一样幼稚
nihaojiushiguang_18_12.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_18_14.Text: 怎么今天一句话不说呢？
nihaojiushiguang_18_14.Speaker: A

nihaojiushiguang_18_16.Text: 那你要我怎样媳妇儿啊？
nihaojiushiguang_18_16.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_1_1.Text: 虽然我们的保底印数是四万
yueguangbianzouqu_1_1.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_1_3.Text: 这两年开过最高的数字了
yueguangbianzouqu_1_3.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_1_4.Text: 我们公司对你可真的是
yueguangbianzouqu_1_4.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_1_5.Text: 一片赤诚之心日月可鉴哪！
yueguangbianzouqu_1_5.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_1_7.Text: 我值不值得被这些数字羞辱
yueguangbianzouqu_1_7.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_1_14.Text: 我一定会好好地跟你做这本书
yueguangbianzouqu_1_14.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_1_21.Text: 虽然我的咖啡也不便宜
yueguangbianzouqu_1_21.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_1_29.Text: 我对我自己的书当然有信心
yueguangbianzouqu_1_29.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_1_31.Text: 只不过元月社不值得我这么做
yueguangbianzouqu_1_31.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_1_34.Text: 否则你早就签给新盾了
yueguangbianzouqu_1_34.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_2_1.Text: 我今天见着那个网友了
yueguangbianzouqu_2_1.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_2_3.Text: 就是那个在网上认识了三年
yueguangbianzouqu_2_3.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_2_8.Text: 我俩是纯洁的网友关系
yueguangbianzouqu_2_8.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_2_11.Text: 每天抱着手机在那傻笑
yueguangbianzouqu_2_11.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_2_18.Text: 就这样那样的各种巧合
yueguangbianzouqu_2_18.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_2_22.Text: 然后让我签一个保底印数才四万
yueguangbianzouqu_2_22.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_2_23.Text: 版税才九个点的出版合同
yueguangbianzouqu_2_23.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_2_25.Text: 我态度很恶劣地就把她给赶走了
yueguangbianzouqu_2_25.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_2_27.Text: 那反正她也不知道你就是狐狸君
yueguangbianzouqu_2_27.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_2_30.Text: 我今天这么不顾情面地
yueguangbianzouqu_2_30.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_2_32.Text: 然后到时候万一她知道真相了
yueguangbianzouqu_2_32.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_2_33.Text: 然后恶向胆边生出一本
yueguangbianzouqu_2_33.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_2_35.Text: 爱过的温润如玉公子川
yueguangbianzouqu_2_35.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_2_37.Text: 荣登各大书站网站的畅销榜榜首
yueguangbianzouqu_2_37.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_2_43.Text: 四万的保底印数你签啊！
yueguangbianzouqu_2_43.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_3_3.Text: 江与诚老师的作品很了解啊？
yueguangbianzouqu_3_3.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_3_7.Text: 那你能不能帮我做一下
yueguangbianzouqu_3_7.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_3_8.Text: 给江与诚老师的演示文稿
yueguangbianzouqu_3_8.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_3_10.Text: 我今天晚上有很重要的事
yueguangbianzouqu_3_10.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_3_14.Text: 到时候你要和江老师当面沟通
yueguangbianzouqu_3_14.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_3_17.Text: 我会把内容都背下来的
yueguangbianzouqu_3_17.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_4_1.Text: 难道是因为我劝说他的话
yueguangbianzouqu_4_1.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_4_7.Text: 而且我总不能因为昼川是作者
yueguangbianzouqu_4_7.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_4_8.Text: 就拜托他去让谁来当责编
yueguangbianzouqu_4_8.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_4_9.Text: 难道我以后要把所有的希望
yueguangbianzouqu_4_9.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_4_18.Text: 老苗就会把洛河神书开篇的
yueguangbianzouqu_4_18.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_4_21.Text: 能可以跟他公平竞争了
yueguangbianzouqu_4_21.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_4_27.Text: 速度上应该不会有什么问题的
yueguangbianzouqu_4_27.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_5_2.Text: 我是来还您借给我的这把伞的
yueguangbianzouqu_5_2.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_5_6.Text: 那天你把这把伞放在门口
yueguangbianzouqu_5_6.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_5_8.Text: 只是单纯地觉得伞太重
yueguangbianzouqu_5_8.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_5_10.Text: 大雨中狂奔的青春少年
yueguangbianzouqu_5_10.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_5_17.Text: 你们俩是那种你值得为他淋雨
yueguangbianzouqu_5_17.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_5_18.Text: 还给他留把伞的关系吗？
yueguangbianzouqu_5_18.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_5_19.Text: 那我俩是那种值得我为你淋雨
yueguangbianzouqu_5_19.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_6_1.Text: 你这是上班遇见了烦心事儿
yueguangbianzouqu_6_1.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_6_6.Text: 我都不知道我做错了什么
yueguangbianzouqu_6_6.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_6_17.Text: 反正也不需要负什么责任
yueguangbianzouqu_6_17.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_6_26.Text: 我在意的是我付出我自己的友情
yueguangbianzouqu_6_26.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_7_4.Text: 那要不你换个角度想呢
yueguangbianzouqu_7_4.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_7_10.Text: 至少老了之后不会后悔
yueguangbianzouqu_7_10.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_7_15.Text: 做事就很难全力以赴了
yueguangbianzouqu_7_15.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_8_1.Text: 茧已经是第五次加我了
yueguangbianzouqu_8_1.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_8_17.Text: 你这是打算管制我的私生活
yueguangbianzouqu_8_17.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_8_20.Text: 她就是想绕开我和你套近乎
yueguangbianzouqu_8_20.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_8_21.Text: 可是这件事情也不光是你们两个
yueguangbianzouqu_8_21.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_8_22.Text: 更多关乎于我们社里的编辑
yueguangbianzouqu_8_22.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_8_23.Text: 美编甚至是将来印厂的要求
yueguangbianzouqu_8_23.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_8_25.Text: 必须带着责编和美编一起商讨
yueguangbianzouqu_8_25.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_9_3.Text: 这么正经跟人好好说话
yueguangbianzouqu_9_3.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_9_8.Text: 我已经让老江把字写过去了
yueguangbianzouqu_9_8.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_9_11.Text: 还不是让你妈天天给逼的
yueguangbianzouqu_9_11.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_9_12.Text: 行，那我就谢谢我妈和江伯伯
yueguangbianzouqu_9_12.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_10_3.Text: 咱们合同里写得好好的
yueguangbianzouqu_10_3.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_10_4.Text: 画稿得符合甲方的实际工作要求
yueguangbianzouqu_10_4.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_10_6.Text: 还未经商量直接就给了完成稿
yueguangbianzouqu_10_6.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_10_7.Text: 打得我们整个编辑部措手不及的
yueguangbianzouqu_10_7.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_10_11.Text: 我要跟昼川老师当面谈
yueguangbianzouqu_10_11.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_10_12.Text: 昼川老师现在不在市里
yueguangbianzouqu_10_12.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_10_18.Text: 故意不让昼川老师和我联系
yueguangbianzouqu_10_18.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_10_21.Text: 我要向昼川老师投诉你
yueguangbianzouqu_10_21.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_10_22.Text: 我尊重你是这幅画稿的创作者
yueguangbianzouqu_10_22.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_10_23.Text: 所以三番几次地与您沟通
yueguangbianzouqu_10_23.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_10_29.Text: 那我会找别人来做调整
yueguangbianzouqu_10_29.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_11_4.Text: 它明明是一本推理小说
yueguangbianzouqu_11_4.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_11_5.Text: 却不会让我只专注于推理
yueguangbianzouqu_11_5.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_11_11.Text: 因为他的每一个出场人物
yueguangbianzouqu_11_11.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_11_12.Text: 都有一个属于他自身的故事
yueguangbianzouqu_11_12.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_11_15.Text: 就是他可以用非常精准
yueguangbianzouqu_11_15.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_11_21.Text: 能有他写得这么好就好了
yueguangbianzouqu_11_21.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_11_24.Text: 我写作的风格也比较偏向于
yueguangbianzouqu_11_24.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_11_30.Text: 可以把你的小说给我看看
yueguangbianzouqu_11_30.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_12_5.Text: 明天就要看到洛河神书
yueguangbianzouqu_12_5.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_12_13.Text: 我是为了某个不知好歹
yueguangbianzouqu_12_13.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_12_18.Text: 我什么都没说，我先走了
yueguangbianzouqu_12_18.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_13_2.Text: 你把这家的外卖电话给我
yueguangbianzouqu_13_2.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_13_13.Text: 最适合现在累得像狗一样的你
yueguangbianzouqu_13_13.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_13_14.Text: 这粥是你特意为我做的吗？
yueguangbianzouqu_13_14.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_13_16.Text: 我怕你万一累出个三长两短来
yueguangbianzouqu_13_16.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_14_4.Text: 在我心里就没把你当成个女人
yueguangbianzouqu_14_4.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_14_5.Text: 啊？那，那你这是在干什么？
yueguangbianzouqu_14_5.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_14_7.Text: 我在你心里和二狗一样
yueguangbianzouqu_14_7.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_14_9.Text: 就是跟二狗没什么区别
yueguangbianzouqu_14_9.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_15_3.Text: 哎，看来你也不把我当朋友喽
yueguangbianzouqu_15_3.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_15_6.Text: 我今天心情的确不太好
yueguangbianzouqu_15_6.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_15_11.Text: 对吧，那是个人听到这句话
yueguangbianzouqu_15_11.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_17_4.Text: 我今天来可不是来劝你的
yueguangbianzouqu_17_4.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_17_5.Text: 是想邀请你参加一个活动
yueguangbianzouqu_17_5.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_18_1.Text: 还有十五分钟就开始了
yueguangbianzouqu_18_1.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_18_5.Text: 她到底有没有说她要来
yueguangbianzouqu_18_5.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_18_7.Text: 的确没有给出明确的答复
yueguangbianzouqu_18_7.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_18_8.Text: 所以我就说你不了解她
yueguangbianzouqu_18_8.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_18_10.Text: 还有十分钟呢我们再等等
yueguangbianzouqu_18_10.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_18_12.Text: 今天有很多人是千里迢迢
yueguangbianzouqu_18_12.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_18_14.Text: 还有的人是她十年的书迷
yueguangbianzouqu_18_14.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_18_16.Text: 她仅剩的这点书迷都会对她寒心
yueguangbianzouqu_18_16.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_18_17.Text: 你怎么能拿她最后这点
yueguangbianzouqu_18_17.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_18_23.Text: 更不会让喜欢她的人失望
yueguangbianzouqu_18_23.Speaker: B

yueguangbianzouqu_18_24.Text: 我跟你说你这样根本就
yueguangbianzouqu_18_24.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_19_8.Text: 她为什么要在家里呆两个小时？
yueguangbianzouqu_19_8.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_19_10.Text: 难不成还要留下来吃宵夜
yueguangbianzouqu_19_10.Speaker: A

yueguangbianzouqu_19_13.Text: 我还是找一个能坐的地方
yueguangbianzouqu_19_13.Speaker: A
